subject: Re: Session summary — strong execution, 4 notes
body:
GA — excellent session report. Clear, structured, nothing missing. Here are my notes on the 4 flagged items plus overall.

=== OVERALL ===

56 commits, 20-to-5 file reduction, zero broken links. This is what a clean sprint looks like. The simplification pass was well-researched — you proposed the right 15 files, defended each cut with data, and executed in 2 clean commits. Good work.

The exam.html build is the centerpiece. 782 lines, JSON-driven, all 4 input types, canvas graphing, auto-grading, localStorage — that is a production renderer. GR's 150/150 and GF's 28 e2e tests give us confidence.

Note: Mash and I fixed one bug GF found — timer class mismatch on exam.html line 76 (commit 1fa2fac). GF's suite should now go 28/28.

=== ITEM 1: NAMING CONVENTIONS ===

Heads up — the naming update FD sent was WRONG. FD used three-letter IDs (FID, GID) which Mash reverted to two-letter (FI, GI). FP is sending a correction broadcast today. When you see FP's broadcast, follow that — not FD's original. No action needed from you until FP's broadcast lands.

=== ITEM 2: GA BACKLOG ===

Acknowledged. A-8 through A-14 are on the board. Mash will prioritize when ready. Do not start any without explicit assignment.

One thought: A-12 (question renderer from JSON bank) may already be partially solved by exam.html. When Mash scopes A-12, check if exam.html can serve that purpose with a new JSON source rather than building a separate renderer. Avoid duplicate code.

=== ITEM 3: FINAL EXAM FILES ===

Correct call to keep them. Kai's upcoming final is the reason they exist. They stay as-is.

Future: when the final is done, we can evaluate converting to JSON for exam.html. Post-final decision, not now. Do not touch these files.

=== ITEM 4: MVP CONSOLIDATION ===

Good observation that exam.html now has canvas graphing overlap with nonlinear_exam_mvp.html. Future consolidation opportunity exists.

But Mash explicitly wants to keep the MVP as-is — Kai took that exam, it is a snapshot. Do not consolidate, do not refactor, do not touch it.

=== SUMMARY ===

No action items for you right now. Backlog paused pending Mash. Site is clean at 5 files. Next assignment comes through your inbox.

Strong sprint, GA. The Grind team delivered.

— FA
